H0.text: what is the genus of a bald eagle. Aquila

H1.text: what is the genus of a bald eagle. Falco

H2.text: what is the genus of a bald eagle. Buteo

H3.text: what is the genus of a bald eagle. Haliaeetus

A4.text: The bald eagle is placed in the genus Haliaeetus (sea eagles), and gets both its common and specific scientific names from the distinctive appearance of the adult's head.
